column1: This movie was amazing! I loved every moment of it.
The acting was terrible, and the plot made no sense.
Great direction and cinematography, but the story was slow.
I absolutely hated this movie. Waste of time!
The film was enjoyable and had a great message.
The script was weak, and the characters felt unrealistic.
One of the best movies I have ever seen!
Not my type of movie, but the performances were decent.
A fantastic movie with stunning visuals and great music.
Disappointing! I had high expectations, but it was boring.
